content: {"name": "Wholesome Riches @ Coopers Point", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Clients can follow us on social media for the most up to date schedules. We run along with the school schedule so if the school is closed, we will not be having the food distribution. However, your clients should check facebook/instagram (https://www.facebook.com/wholesomeriches/)(https://www.instagram.com/wholesomeriches/) as we post for the month, week and day.", "email": "", "url": "https://wholesomeriches.org/589-2/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "201 State Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Cooper Point", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08102", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.9538447, "longitude": -75.1224221}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 441-3676", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
